frontmatter.title: Sense of Adventure
frontmatter.tagline: Find yourself in the natural wonders of Transylvania.
frontmatter.description: Full nature immersion will give you the perfect opportunity to fully connect with nature and release the stress of urban life. Embark on an adventure that will take you through the heart of the mountains, paved by centuries of history and tradition. Discover the nature wonders of Transylvania in a unique way, an adventure specially designed to offer the most genuine discovery process. With high focus on various ways to explore the mountains and enjoy the nature, numerous elements of culture and traditions will still be present. In this way we ensure an experience where memories are being formed, while footsteps are left behind.
included: Uncharted Team group leader that will assist you throughout the tour (English speaking)
Entry fees to the objectives within the tour
This adventure is a package deal; therefore, it provides you with coverage from
Travel Guarantee Fund (Rejsegarantifonden) – to see your benefits – click here
